Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh yeah, also! Some of the Koroks could
use your help.

You should probably talk to the Great
Deku Tree first, but then maybe you
can help out...
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>And I've got a favor to ask! Some of the
Koroks could use your help...
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you do, you'll come across different
Koroks who could use your help. Please
go find them, and see what they need!
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You...<sp:5:1:0> This is perfect! I've got a favor
to ask.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Some of the Koroks have had stuff on
their minds lately.
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Wakeup>*yaaawn*<sp:5:1:0> My head's still all fuzzy...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh! You're... Hang on. What are you
doing here?
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You should go talk to the Koroks who
need help!
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh, oh, yeah! Now I remember! It all
happened so suddenly.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>The Great Deku Tree was in agony, and
ominous fog came out of his mouth...

And THEN! A bunch of us Koroks started
acting funny.

<sp:3:0:2:0900>Next thing I knew, monsters showed up,
and I fought them all by myself, knocking
them out one by one by one!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Um... Sorry.<sp:5:1:0> I lied. I actually couldn't
move and don't even remember
what happened.
It was all so sudden... I don't know if any
of the others remember either.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>But thanks to you, Mr. Hero, everybody is
back to normal! Yay!

I'm sure the Great Deku Tree wants to
say thank you too! You should go!
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Koroks are happy as can be.
Hmmm, I'm guessing<sp:5:2:0> it's because
of you? Thank you!
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>As everyone knows, the Great Deku Tree
is the spirit of Korok Forest!

If you climb up the root behind me, you
can talk with him.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're the one who saved the Great Deku
Tree's life, so please go say hello!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh, you already met up?


The Great Deku Tree has been alive much
longer than us Koroks, so he's kinda stoic
and doesn't always show his feelings.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But I'm sure that he's thankful and happy
for what you did! And so am I!
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Because of you,<sp:5:0:0> Korok Forest has
returned to being peaceful again.
Thank you!
Oh, have you met with the Great Deku
Tree yet? If you still haven't, well then,
you should!
